Florence Lucille Tynan

  1. Foster Name: Florence
  2. Foster Family: Cornelius and Anna Vandevegt
  3. Location of Family: Cedar Rapids, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-11-04, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1999-11-06, Columbus, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Florence Demuth
  11. Spouse Name: Joseph N. Demuth
  12. Source: Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf, By Train They Came: Fragile Excess Baggage vol. 2 (Denver: Outskirts Press, 2007), p. 53-58; Columbus Telegram, 8 November 1999; 1930 United States Federal Census.
